stories.title: PEP 680 – tomllib: Support for parsing TOML in the Standard Library

stories.text:
Hey Folks,

As you know most modern applications are built using open source software e.g log4j. I wanted to ask, If anyone would like to participate in my “Current and future state of open source security” initiative I’m conducting with 100+ founders worldwide? Final findings will be shared anonymously with participants to share knowledge and insights.

P.S: I am not trying to sell anything. Best

Cool Go trick: Defining methods in function types

stories.text:
We’re a fairly complex SaaS and are considering building a training centre to supplement our support portal.

What are some common incentives that we can use to entice our customers to complete training sessions. I realize that offering them money is the obvious one, although I haven’t heard of anyone ever doing that.
stories.title: Ask HN: How to incentivize customers to complete training sessions?
Pro-worker ideas in political manifestos linked to more votes
